abstract: northern trust gets ibd stock rating upgrade .
article: on wednesday , northern trust got an upgrade for its ibd smartselect composite rating from 94 to 97 . the revised score means the stock currently tops 97 % of all other stocks in terms of key performance metrics and technical strength . northern trust is now out of buy range after breaking out from a 97.21 entry in a cup with handle . looking for winning stocks ? try this simple routinethe stock earns an 84 eps rating , meaning its recent quarterly and annual earnings growth is outpacing 84 % of all stocks . its accumulation/distribution rating of a - shows heavy buying by institutional investors , such as mutual funds and pension funds , over the last 13 weeks .

the company posted an 11 % rise in earnings for q3 . that marks two straight quarters of rising eps growth . sales growth rose 15 % , up from 3 % in the prior report . that marks one quarter of rising revenue growth . the company 's next quarterly report is expected on or around jan. . 18 . northern trust holds the no . 4 rank among its peers in the banks-super regional industry group . comerica is the top-ranked stock within the group . related : which companies are now outperforming 95 % of all stocks ?
